text:
I'm including the patches for the 5 files to upgrade the blog from Atom 0.2 to
Atom 0.3.   This set of patches includes a TRANG'd version of entry.rng that
will have to be updated later on.  I have assigned them to Lenya 1.4, as this is
a change in the Atom spec.

The sample blogs (feeds) that I have created are Atom 0.3 compliant.

BTW, there was no 'blog' or 'weblog' Component ;)
creator: dechrist1@yahoo.com
